names.name: Elohim Gibor
names.description: The Divine Name associated with Geburah, signifying the justice and power of God to overcome adversaries.

names.name: Kamael
names.description: The Archangel of strength and courage in the face of adversity.

names.name: Seraphim
names.description: The order of angels associated with Geburah, symbolizing purification through fire.

names.name: Mars
names.description: The planetary influence associated with Geburah, representing assertive energy, warfare, and conflict.

names.name: Din
names.description: Reflects the aspect of strict judgment and the necessary destruction that precedes construction.

names.name: Pachad
names.description: Symbolizes the severity and awe inspired by the raw power of creation.
